website_summaries.verdict: Extremely lightweight club head so you can generate as much club speed and distance as possible.
pros: Even on mis-hits, you're going to receive a good level of ball speed and distance, thanks to the high quality of materials in the club face
Multiple options available for club face loft, so you can pick the perfect option for your needs
cons: Has a higher than average price point

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for a 66 year old duffer
customer_reviews.text: Got the Callaway 3+ (13.5) about three weeks ago and have played a number of rounds with it. I have biased it to the 12.5 degree/draw setting and am crunching it 220+ yards straight down the fairway. Not bad for a 66 year old duffer. Great feel and very easy to hit. Would highly recommend this club for those who have trouble hitting the drivers that look like they have a small animal on the end of the club. Have no problems at all keeping up with those who chose the drivers and keep it in the fairway much more consistently. Pretty much shoot in the mid 80s even with a crummy short game.
customer_reviews.author: Steve F Combs

customer_reviews.title: Heavenly sevenly
customer_reviews.text: Gave this to an elderly friend but, I tried it first and man! I hit the heck outta that club. Ez 200yds, high and soft from fairways and first cut collar. Great club.
customer_reviews.author: Norman

customer_reviews.title: Great driver
customer_reviews.text: It is the best driver I have used to date. Make sure you get the correct shaft for your game
customer_reviews.author: johnnyd

customer_reviews.title: great club
customer_reviews.text: the Epic woods are solid...I will be bombing it down the fairway b*****s!
customer_reviews.author: Zippo

customer_reviews.title: GREAT club.
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my buddy who was in need of a new 3 wood and MAN did he knock this out of the park. FIRST swing, and he puts it within two yards of the pin. GREAT club.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Brown

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars plus
customer_reviews.text: 20 yards further than my Titleist and my XR16, ridiculously forgiving!
customer_reviews.author: Charlie L.

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: Slight imperfections to crown, but was listed as used to begin with. Still performs as it should.
customer_reviews.author: Russell

customer_reviews.title: The Epic three metal is a very well designed club ...
customer_reviews.text: The Epic three metal is a very well designed club. Well struck shots fly high and long. Long enough that most players probably can just hit the three metal off the tee instead of driver with more control.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Czekalski

customer_reviews.title: Game improvement!
customer_reviews.text: Sold my new Taylormade M2 wood and replaced it with Callaway GBB Epic, significant game improvement in getting down the fairway.
customer_reviews.author: Meme45

customer_reviews.title: Easy to hit off the fairway or tees.
customer_reviews.text: Adjustable for individuals. my second one for my other bag
customer_reviews.author: Da Rink

customer_reviews.title: Rip off
customer_reviews.text: Shaft broke a week after I had it right at the rim of the bag...I was walking down the fairway and the head fell of in the cover...
customer_reviews.author: paul smolak

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: All the hype you read is true. Although the monkey hitting the ball has to do his part.
customer_reviews.author: boracho

customer_reviews.title: Very nice looking club but I am disappointed in it
customer_reviews.text: Obviously, it could be me but I have not found it to be forgiving nor has my distance increased. Very nice looking club but I am disappointed in it, especially for the price. My index is 25, to answer that question in advance.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

product_meta.title: Callaway Golf 2017 Men's Great Big Bertha Epic Fairway Wood
product_meta.description: PLEASE NOTE: Orginal headcover is NOT available Golf Digest 2018 Hot List Gold Medal Winner! GBB Epic fairway woods incorporate our revolutionary and proprietary triaxial carbon composite material to enhance forgiveness, power and accuracy in a huge way. The triaxial carbon crown weighs just 5.8g, making it an incredible 78% lighter than a steel crown.* The saved weight is redistributed into strategic locations within the head to maximize MOI and lower the CG, making Epic fairway woods extraordinarily easy to launch.
feature_bullets: Weight saved by the ultra-light triaxle carbon crown (78% lighter than steel) is repositioned to increase MOI and lower the CG for easy launch and added power
The latest generation of our hyper speed face cup is more efficient at delivering fast ball speed across the face, especially on mis-hits, for increased average distance
Fast head speed from speed step technology - developed with Direct Input from aerospace experts to improve aerodynamics for fast swing speed and distance without extra effort
Wide loft selection including 3+ and heaven wood - six models - 3+, 3, 5, 7, 9, heaven wood - gives golfers multiple opportunities to put epic performance in their bag
